page.title: 14VILLAGES IN OUR 'D' BLOCK
page.content: {OVER STRATTON}is in the South East corner of our 'D' block.I live at Over Stratton.Over Stratton is about 1 kilometre long.There is a Methodist church and a pub called the Royal Oak. There is a post office/general stores. Every year the May Fair is held at Stratton house which belongs to the Gaminaraas. Many orchards surround the village and they make a nice walk. {LOPEN}is a small village in the South of the 'D' block. It has no shops but there is a cattle feed mill there. { {SEAVINGTON ST.MICHAEL & ST.MARY}are two villages in the South West of our 'D'block. There is a pub, sub-Post Office and playing field. Of the two churches, only St.Michael's still holds services.{ {SOUTH PETHERTON}is the largest village in the 'D'BLOCK.(See other text pages)
